buildArtifacts.build_cmd: ./test-site/scripts/setup_for_yext_sites.sh && npm run setup-test-site && npm run build-test-site

livePreview.serve_setup_cmd: mkdir -p /temp/theme && mv * /temp/theme && mkdir answers-hitchhiker-theme && mv /temp/theme/sites-config . && mv /temp/theme/* answers-hitchhiker-theme && npm run build-test-site
